entry.title: Information about this webpage
entry.content:
Hi! Welcome to my webpage. In this post I'll briefly explain the contents of this site.

This site was made using 11ty, having as a base the eleventy high performance blog provided by google, and I will use it as a place to post information about my projects and my professional life.

If you want information about my projects, go to the projects section. If you want to see the latest updates about my work, go to the posts section.

My contact information can be found at the main page of this site. If you have any question about me, my projects or any other work please don't hesitate to ask!
